item.description:
You want to know who finally beat Trump, ie they took the prime time news cursor away from him?

Here's the answer.

Women.

With an assist from whoever it was at Twitter who cut off his account.
item.source:markdown:

item.description:
Michelle Goldberg regrets calling on Al Franken to resign. But she misses an important point. Men saw what happened too. And men vote. So there's another reason to regret, it was awful politics.

https://t.co/7ce8yvnC3P
item.source:markdown:
